episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1101_01:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] friends
headed to the top of the mountain to check out
the minecart there.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1101_02:
However, they discovered a strange duo who got
there first.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1001_03: Hello, everyone! We’ve been waiting for you!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1001_04:
Whoa, what’s going on?! Are you twins
or something?
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1001_05:
Oh, wait! Are you the Subway Bosses
from Unova?
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1001_07:
They’re superstrong Trainers you can battle on
the subway!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1001_08: At least, that’s what Hilda told me.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1001_09: Right you are! We’re the Subway Bosses!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1001_10:
We hone our skills and aim for greater heights in
the Battle Subway in Unova!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1001_11:
As the subway travels underground, we enjoy
Pokémon battles with our passengers inside the
subway cars!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1001_12: Whoa, really? That sounds like so much fun!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1001_13:
If you ever visit Unova, we’d love for you to ride
with us! Both Ingo and I will eagerly await
your arrival!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1001_14: Awesome! I’m definitely going to visit—and win!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1001_15:
Actually, why wait? C’mon, let’s battle here
and now!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1001_16:
Bravo! Excellent! Your enthusiasm has the
momentum of a high-speed express train!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1001_17:
However, we’d like to take a slight detour before
this battle.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1001_18:
I apologize for eavesdropping, but we happened to
overhear your conversation at the Pokémon Center.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1001_19: And because of that, I came up with an idea!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1001_20:
Ingo wants to use these minecarts to create
something like the Battle Subway here on Pasio!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1001_22:
And of course, the best place for us to battle is
right on the tracks!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1001_23:
But we knew it would be impolite to explore the
tracks on our own before you could.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1001_24:
Oh, I get it! You were waiting for us so we could
all explore together!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4001_1001_25: Let’s do it! I wanna see where these tracks go!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4002_1101_01:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] friends
followed the tracks...
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4002_1001_02: Hey, the tracks just stop here!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4002_1001_03:
In that case, we’ll just have to clear a path for
laying down the rest of the tracks!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4002_1001_04:
Do you think it would be OK for us to do that
without asking permission?
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4002_1001_05:
Oh, in that case, you should probably ask Lear!
He’s the owner of this island!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4002_1001_06: I see! Then let’s find him right away!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4002_1001_09:
Once you get those tracks up and running, I’m
definitely coming back to give them a shot!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4003_1001_01:
Apparently, we can meet Lear if we battle our
way through the Battle Villa!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4003_1001_02:
It seems battles on Pasio are fought as
three-on-three matches...
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4003_1001_03:
But this is our chance to show everyone how
strong we Subway Bosses are!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4003_1001_04:
Precisely! Let’s demonstrate our combined power
as a two-car train like we always do, Emmet!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4003_1001_05:
Or perhaps we’d be a four-car train, if you really
think about it.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4003_1001_06:
Oh, you’re right! Sync pairs include a Trainer and
their partner Pokémon!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4003_1001_07:
We’ll have to make sure we’re more in sync with
our partners than ever before!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4004_1001_02:
According to my data-interpreting machine... Yes.
Very interesting, indeed. Looks like...
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4004_1001_05:
Oh, don’t let it concern you. I’m sure you’ll figure
it out once we start our battle!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4004_1001_09: Wow! You Subway Bosses sure are strong!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4004_1001_10:
*sigh* I guess my machine’s analysis was accurate
after all...
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4004_1001_11:
We sure had a lot of fun! Battle us
again sometime!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4005_1001_01:
Welcome, Subway Bosses! I’ve heard about how
skilled you two are.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4005_1001_02:
But let me assure you...you won’t be shortchanged
by facing me.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4005_1001_03: Excellent! We shall rise to the challenge!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4005_1001_04:
*chuckle* Very well. I see you require
no convincing.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4005_1001_08:
Our Pokémon cannot be faulted in any way,
shape, or form.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4006_1101_01:
After battling some tough opponents, Ingo and
Emmet finally reached Lear!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4006_1001_02:
I’m impressed that the two of you managed to
make it all the way here.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4006_1001_03:
I’m so impressed, I’ll overlook the fact that you
ignored Pasio’s rules about three-on-three battles!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4006_1001_04:
You mentioned some kind of request, didn’t you?
Let’s hear it.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4006_1001_05:
Yes, sir! We’d like your permission to begin
construction on the tracks on the mountain!
So that we can use the minecarts!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4006_1001_06: Oh, is that all? I don’t mind. Do as you wish.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4006_1001_07:
However! I will not accept any injuries or
accidents, understood?
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4006_1001_10:
That being said, you’re not cleared to begin
construction just yet.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4006_1001_11: There’s someone else you need to talk to first.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_01:
We need to speak to Clay, the Gym Leader of
Driftveil City.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_02:
Yes! Apparently, he got permission before we did
to begin excavating that mountain!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_03:
Clay is not just a Gym Leader. He is also a
successful businessman.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_04: He might be a tough negotiator!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_05:
Lear said we might have to talk to some other
people, too. Folks who “like to get their hands
dirty.” I wonder what he meant by that.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_06: Oh-ho! Well, look what we got here!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_07: So y’all came to Pasio, too, huh?
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_08: It’s nice to see you, Clay!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_43:
It certainly was a surprise to find that our train
took us all the way to Pasio...
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_09:
But now we’re here! And we want to make
battles even more exciting! So, we came to ask
a favor of you!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1101_10: Ingo and Emmet explained the situation to Clay.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_11:
Is that right? Sounds mighty interestin’, if ya
ask me.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_13: But I can’t say yes just yet.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_14:
Our group got permission first, and though I
wouldn’t mind lettin’ you boys take over...
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_15:
There’s a proper procedure to gettin’ things done,
and I’m set on finishin’ this job before I pass this
site off to anyone else.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_17:
In that case, why don’t I lend you a hand? I can
help you complete your job first!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_20:
I want to make Ingo’s idea a reality! Please,
let me do this!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_22:
I won’t let you do that all by yourself! I’ll help
you, too, Clay!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_23: Excadrill and I will definitely fit your needs!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_24:
Heh. Well, that’s a mighty fine Excadrill ya
got there.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_25:
If y’all insist on helpin’, I certainly don’t mind...but
let’s ask the others.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_26: Hey! Could y’all come out here?
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_29:
Wow! The Champion of Hoenn and a Sinnoh
Gym Leader!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_30:
Ah, so this is what Lear meant by folks who like to
get their hands dirty...
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_31:
These fellers are the ones who’re actually leadin’
this project. I’m just helpin’ ’em out.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_32:
This island’s an artificial construct, see. Land’s
made up of dirt, sand, and rocks from all sorts
of places.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_33:
To them, it’s a pile of treasure just waitin’ to be
dug up!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_34: Steven, Roark... I got a proposition for ya.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_35:
How interesting! I love that idea, so I don’t mind if
you two want to do that kind of construction here!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_38:
But...if you find any interesting fossils or stones
while you’re working here, would you mind letting
us have them?
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_39:
Of course! We would be delighted to do so! You
have our word!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_40:
Well, if the leaders are on board, there’s nothin’
stoppin’ you from startin’ yer project! Don’t worry
about us! Go ahead and start excavatin’!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4007_1001_42: Next stop, the summit! All aboard!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4008_1001_01:
Excadrill will start drilling through the rocks! And
Archeops will help carry the debris!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4008_1001_02:
I just love to see combinations of Pokémon
working together!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4008_1001_04:
Once this project is complete, we’ll be able to see
even more wonderful combinations!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4009_1101_02:
With the tracks completed, sync pairs flocked in
droves to the newly opened battle area!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4010_1101_01:
The sync pairs followed the tracks down into the
underground tunnel...
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4010_1101_02:
and battled their way deeper into the mountain,
while minecarts occasionally brought items for the
sync pairs to use.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4010_1101_03:
The Subway Bosses stood ready in the depths of
the tunnel, awaiting any challengers who could
battle their way to them!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_01:
You can do it, Braviary! We won’t lose in a battle
of speed!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_02: Don’t forget—Emmet is not your only opponent!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_08:
I should’ve remembered how strong these
Subway Bosses are!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_09: Sorry, Hilda! Guess I have to get better, huh...
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_10:
What are you apologizing for? We’re a team,
aren’t we? We both did our best!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_11:
Let’s keep on training and give it another try
next time!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_13: Your battle wasn’t bad at all.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_14:
However, we seem to have done slightly
better than you.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_15: We’d really like to battle with you again!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_17:
Bravo! Just as we thought, there are many
excellent Trainers here on Pasio!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_18: We don’t have any time to rest!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_19:
Everyone is battling seriously and having fun!
That’s why I can’t stop!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_20:
Ingo, I’m so glad we were able to bring your idea
to life!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_21: Oh, look! More passengers have arrived to battle!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_22:
Hello, Subway Bosses. It was quite the challenge
to get all the way here.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_24:
We heard rumors that you visited the Unova
region! We’ve been waiting for you to ride with
us ever since!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_25:
Sorry, I didn’t get a chance to see Nimbasa City
while I was in Unova...
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_26:
But I’m glad I’m here today to make up for it!
I’m going to give this battle my all...
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_28: H-hello, everyone! It’s nice to meet you!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_29:
I trained in Hoenn to take on the world. Please
have a look at my results!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_31:
I, Cynthia, challenge you! There won’t be
any letup from me!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_32:
Of course! Let’s have the greatest battle—better
than ever before!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_33:
Now, Emmet, if you have something
to add, please!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4011_1001_34: What I do. What I say. Always the same.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4012_1001_02:
I suppose that means you’re going to challenge us,
aren’t you?
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4012_1001_03: Bravo! We’ve been waiting for you to do just that!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4012_1001_04:
Here, we don’t follow the standard Pasio battle
rules of three-on-three...
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4012_1001_05: Instead, we will take you on as a two-car train!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4012_1001_06: Grab a friend and hop on board!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4012_1001_07: We’ll be waiting for you at the end of these tracks!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4012_1001_08: This time, I’m really serious. Really serious.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4012_1001_09: Because if a battle isn’t serious, it isn’t fun.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4012_1001_10:
I’m looking forward to a serious battle with
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4013_1001_02:
The best combination of you and your Pokémon...
No, your entire team! It was incredible!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4013_1001_03: I am Emmet. I lost together with Ingo.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4013_1001_04: But I feel good. And I think the best team won.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4013_1001_05:
Your combination is the best. Perfect! You’ll keep
getting stronger!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4013_1001_06:
The strength you have, your trust in your Pokémon
and your team, their never-ending support!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4013_1001_07:
You want to win, and I don’t want to lose.
Those feelings are real.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4013_1001_08: When we clash in battles, I feel very excited!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4013_1001_09: Yep! It was so much fun!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4013_1001_10: Winning against us is a milestone in your life.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4013_1001_11:
You, [Name:PlayerNickname ], can rack up
more and more wins.
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4013_1001_12: When you and someone else combine...
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4013_1001_14: Please move on to an even greater goal!
episode_event_nobori_kudari/4013_1001_15:
If we fight again, we won’t know what to expect.
That’s why we’re waiting for you to come back!
